title.narrative: Cash and food transfers to chronically food insecure households

description.narrative: This activity (Cash and food transfers to chronically food insecure households) is a component of Productive Safety Net Programme Phase 4 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Non-budget support financial aid' and a budget of £92,976,615. This component benefits Ethiopia, and works in the following sector(s): Social Protection, Rural development, Food assistance. , with the following implementing partners: Ministry of Finance and Economic Development - Ethiopia. The start date is 01-07-2015 and the end date is 30-06-2020.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Finance and Economic Development - Ethiopia

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
